title: Pestilence
description: Pestilence is an action/thriller game where you play as an ancient deity of disease trying to reclaim a disease that has run rampant in the subway tunnels of a near-future city.

title: Cardlite Adventure
description: Welcome to Cardlite Adventure you take the role of a Greedy Young Adventurer traveling different monster infested locals in your search for Treasure.

title: 2D Algorithm Visualizer
description: Created from Microsoft's resume workshop and deployed to GitHub pages. Includes my experience and design abilities.
